text: @GregAbbott_TX How many deaths per day in Texas none covid19? Are we just marking them all as #COVID19 now? Where can we see our Texas official corona virus scoreboard? Seeing different numbers from all kinds of sources. Who is liable if the numbers are not reported CORRECTLY to State of Texas?
